name: Inverted-Quality
author: thesixthroc
title: Inverted Quality (Alpha)
description:
Replaces Quality by a new system, Degradation.

Mined and smelted items start at Nominal degradation. Each time an item is crafted, it has a 90% chance to become more degraded.

A new entity, the Downgrade Port, allows low-degradation items to be used in high-degradation recipes.
